video.title: Lie to Me
video.synopsis: In this procedural crime drama, Dr. Cal Lightman helps the police by using his knowledge of human behavior to determine whether a person is lying.

episodes.synopsis: The world's leading deception expert partners with a psychologist and opens an agency that assists law enforcement in their searches for the truth.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When a military officer is accused of a sexual assault, Cal and Torres determine if the accusation is true before he is shipped back to Afghanistan.
episodes.title: Moral Waiver

episodes.synopsis: The murder of a judge's daughter leads the Lightman Group to a competitive prep school where getting to the head of the class means everything.
episodes.title: A Perfect Score

episodes.synopsis: Cal and his team try to prevent the assassination of a South Korean ambassador, but the case takes a strange turn when someone else is shot instead.
episodes.title: Love Always

episodes.synopsis: Cal and Torres interrogate an imprisoned gang leader who claims to be rehabilitated; if freed, he might help fight violence... or return to crime.
episodes.title: Unchained

episodes.synopsis: Cal and Gillian investigate the case of a missing 11-year-old girl. Eli and Torres must determine whether a famous peace activist's memoir is true.
episodes.title: Do No Harm

episodes.synopsis: When Cal is hired to find a corporate spy at a pharmaceutical company, he uncovers a conspiracy surrounding a risky new drug.
episodes.title: The Best Policy

episodes.synopsis: Cal investigates two young women who committed suicide. The team tries to recover billions of dollars for victims of a Ponzi scheme.
episodes.title: Depraved Heart

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of a building collapse, Cal is brought in to determine who is at fault, and discovers a massive cover-up.
episodes.title: Life Is Priceless

episodes.synopsis: Cal's ex-wife enlists him to help investigate an arson case in which the only eyewitness is a 5-year-old boy.
episodes.title: Better Half

episodes.synopsis: The Lightman Group gets embroiled in the controversial case of a policeman who shot a potentially innocent teenager.
episodes.title: Undercover

episodes.synopsis: An FBI agent teams with the Lightman Group to pursue a rapist. Cal infiltrates a prison to befriend a serial rapist whom the new rapist is emulating.
episodes.title: Blinded

episodes.synopsis: The FBI calls on the Lightman Group to help identify those responsible for a terrorist bombing; the case takes a personal turn for one team member.
episodes.title: Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: The Lightman Group investigates a murder case in which a woman with multiple personalities may be either a witness or the killer.
episodes.title: The Core of It

episodes.synopsis: Zoe enlists the Lightman Group to defend a college football player accused of statutory rape. Meanwhile, Foster and Loker investigate a possible cult.
episodes.title: Truth or Consequences

episodes.synopsis: In Mexico, Cal and Emily get involved in the case of a missing woman. Back home, Foster investigates tainted blood in D.C.-area hospitals.
episodes.title: Control Factor

episodes.synopsis: A man suspected of killing his wife is brought in for questioning by the Lightman Group. Determined to prove his innocence, he takes drastic measures.
episodes.title: Honey

episodes.synopsis: A face from Cal's past pulls him into a dangerous conspiracy. Meanwhile, the group investigates a high school student's homicidal threats.
episodes.title: Grievous Bodily Harm

episodes.synopsis: When a government witness is killed, the FBI hires the group to determine who leaked the witness's whereabouts and to protect the case's star witness.
episodes.title: Lack of Candor

episodes.synopsis: A troubled teenager who believes he was abducted as a baby turns to the Lightman Group to help him uncover the secrets of his past.
episodes.title: Black Friday

episodes.synopsis: Cal goes to Afghanistan to assist in a mission to rescue two captured Marines, and his only source of intelligence is an American expatriate.
episodes.title: Secret Santa

episodes.synopsis: Lightman, Foster and Reynolds travel to Las Vegas to help locate a missing finalist in the World Series of Poker.
episodes.title: Fold Equity

episodes.synopsis: During a political protest in Washington, D.C., a disgruntled farmer parks his explosives-packed tractor near the Treasury Department building.
episodes.title: Tractor Man

episodes.synopsis: Cal plays a dangerous game of cat-and-mouse with a brilliant, charming psychology graduate student whom he identifies as a psychopath.
episodes.title: Beat the Devil

episodes.synopsis: After Lightman's former Pentagon colleague is killed in a car bomb, Lightman and Foster are forced to revisit a series of events from their past.
episodes.title: Sweet Sixteen

episodes.synopsis: Lightman is called to testify in the trial of a beautiful widow accused of murdering her much older husband.
episodes.title: The Whole Truth

episodes.synopsis: Lightman and the team use cutting-edge science and virtual-reality technology to save the life of an Iraq War veteran and his family.
episodes.title: React to Contact

episodes.synopsis: After the grisly shooting of an officer, the D.C. police hire Lightman to read the face of the paralyzed victim, who can move only his eyes.
episodes.title: Teachers and Pupils

episodes.synopsis: Torres's half-sister, who is incarcerated in a juvenile corrections facility, mysteriously re-enters Torres's life when a fellow inmate vanishes.
episodes.title: Delinquent

episodes.synopsis: After a woman dies at a gubernatorial campaign rally in Virginia, the group is hired to assess whether the case is a failed assassination attempt.
episodes.title: Bullet Bump

episodes.synopsis: Cal risks being exposed as a gambler in an underground fight club when one of the fighters is found dead.
episodes.title: Headlock

episodes.synopsis: Lightman and his ex-wife witness the execution of a murderer they prosecuted 17 years ago, but they may have sent the wrong man to his death.
episodes.title: Pied Piper

episodes.synopsis: After Foster's boyfriend, Dave Burns, is abducted, Lightman tries to track him down with the help of Burns's mysterious ex-partner.
episodes.title: Exposed

episodes.synopsis: The Lightman Group investigates the disappearance of a young woman, which leads them to uncover a criminal element in the adult-film business.
episodes.title: Darkness and Light

episodes.synopsis: Testing his ties to the FBI, Lightman investigates the murder of his journalist friend, who was in the process of exposing a corrupt politician.
episodes.title: Black and White

episodes.synopsis: Cal joins a crew that plans to rob a bank so he can sabotage the heist from the inside. But one of the men has a personal motive for his actions.
episodes.title: In the Red

episodes.synopsis: Cal has a case of writer's block, and the office has major personnel issues. The Lightman Group investigates abuse charges at a teen beauty pageant.
episodes.title: The Royal We

episodes.synopsis: Internal Affairs tries to use Lightman's relationship with Wallowski to incriminate her when the Lightman Group examines police profiling techniques.
episodes.title: Dirty Loyal

episodes.synopsis: While vetting a museum's staff for security leaks prior to an exhibition, Lightman meets a beautiful woman who engages him in a game of cat-and-mouse.
episodes.title: Double Blind

episodes.synopsis: Lightman tries to find out who was responsible for a deadly coal mine explosion. The FBI questions Foster about Lightman's gambling partners.
episodes.title: The Canary's Song

episodes.synopsis: Lightman tries to expose a self-help cult leader after a member tries committing suicide. Despite protests, the suicidal member returns to the cult.
episodes.title: Beyond Belief

episodes.synopsis: A woman with Alzheimer's disease unlocks a painful memory from her past, and Lightman discovers a killer may be working at her health care facility.
episodes.title: Veronica

episodes.synopsis: A restaurant owner's daughter is killed during an armed robbery of the family's barbecue joint, and Lightman uncovers a surprising suspect.
episodes.title: Smoked

episodes.synopsis: Lightman is called to a mental hospital to determine if a patient is being held against his will.
episodes.title: Funhouse

episodes.synopsis: Lightman is hired by a wealthy woman to look into her new boyfriend's background.
episodes.title: Rebound

episodes.synopsis: Lightman investigates three students who were responsible for a fatal traffic accident, and interviews the paramedic who was first on the scene.
episodes.title: Saved

episodes.synopsis: When a baby goes missing, the mother accuses a random person of the kidnapping. Lightman investigates, only to find a family desperate for help.
episodes.title: Gone

episodes.synopsis: When the co-creator of a social networking application is found dead, Lightman tries to prove that her partner was the one who committed the crime.
episodes.title: Killer App
